info.name: Hemelsblau
info.description: Minimalistic theme that looks great with image backgrounds consisting of gradients/landscapes. Right sidebar can be transitioned and most colours are custom.
info.additionalInfo: 09/04 this userstyle is now outdated as there is no right sidebar in the tumblr update Currently optimised for dashboard pages (/dashboard) and blog pages (/blog). 28/03 new option to customise sidebar visibility! 13/03 some improvements 19/02 new landscape background choices!!!
